name: diagram
title: Architecture Diagram
xml:
<mxGraphModel dx="1434" dy="844" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="1169" pageHeight="827" math="0" shadow="0">
  <root>
    <mxCell id="0"/>
    <mxCell id="1" parent="0"/>
    
    <!-- Internet -->
    <mxCell id="internet" value="" style="sketch=0;aspect=fixed;html=1;points=[];align=center;image;fontSize=12;image=img/lib/mscae/Azure_Firewall.svg;" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="80" y="360" width="50" height="50" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="internet_label" value="Internet" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="65" y="420" width="80" height="30" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    
    <!-- Load Balancer -->
    <mxCell id="lb" value="" style="sketch=0;outlineConnect=0;fontColor=#232F3E;gradientColor=none;fillColor=#8C4FFF;strokeColor=none;dashed=0;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;align=center;html=1;fontSize=12;fontStyle=0;aspect=fixed;pointerEvents=1;shape=mxgraph.aws4.elastic_load_balancing;" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="260" y="355" width="60" height="60" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="lb_label" value="Load Balancer" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="240" y="425" width="100" height="30" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    
    <!-- Web Tier Background -->
    <mxCell id="web_tier_bg" value="Web Tier" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;verticalAlign=top;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1;opacity=30;" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="420" y="240" width="280" height="140" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    
    <!-- Web Server 1 -->
    <mxCell id="web1" value="" style="sketch=0;outlineConnect=0;fontColor=#232F3E;gradientColor=none;fillColor=#232F3D;strokeColor=none;dashed=0;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;align=center;html=1;fontSize=12;fontStyle=0;aspect=fixed;pointerEvents=1;shape=mxgraph.aws4.traditional_server;" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="450" y="280" width="45" height="78" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="web1_label" value="Web Server 1" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=11;" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="432" y="330" width="80" height="30" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    
    <!-- Web Server 2 -->
    <mxCell id="web2" value="" style="sketch=0;outlineConnect=0;fontColor=#232F3E;gradientColor=none;fillColor=#232F3D;strokeColor=none;dashed=0;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;align=center;html=1;fontSize=12;fontStyle=0;aspect=fixed;pointerEvents=1;shape=mxgraph.aws4.traditional_server;" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="585" y="280" width="45" height="78" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="web2_label" value="Web Server 2" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=11;" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="567" y="330" width="80" height="30" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    
    <!-- App Tier Background -->
    <mxCell id="app_tier_bg" value="Application Tier" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;verticalAlign=top;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1;opacity=30;" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="420" y="420" width="280" height="140" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    
    <!-- App Server 1 -->
    <mxCell id="app1" value="" style="sketch=0;outlineConnect=0;fontColor=#232F3E;gradientColor=none;fillColor=#ED7100;strokeColor=none;dashed=0;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;align=center;html=1;fontSize=12;fontStyle=0;aspect=fixed;pointerEvents=1;shape=mxgraph.aws4.compute;" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="450" y="460" width="50" height="50" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="app1_label" value="App Server 1" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=11;" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="435" y="510" width="80" height="30" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    
    <!-- App Server 2 -->
    <mxCell id="app2" value="" style="sketch=0;outlineConnect=0;fontColor=#232F3E;gradientColor=none;fillColor=#ED7100;strokeColor=none;dashed=0;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;align=center;html=1;fontSize=12;fontStyle=0;aspect=fixed;pointerEvents=1;shape=mxgraph.aws4.compute;" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="585" y="460" width="50" height="50" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="app2_label" value="App Server 2" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=11;" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="570" y="510" width="80" height="30" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    
    <!-- Database Tier Background -->
    <mxCell id="db_tier_bg" value="Database Tier" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;verticalAlign=top;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1;opacity=30;" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="420" y="600" width="280" height="140" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    
    <!-- Primary Database -->
    <mxCell id="db_primary" value="" style="sketch=0;outlineConnect=0;fontColor=#232F3E;gradientColor=none;fillColor=#3F8624;strokeColor=none;dashed=0;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;align=center;html=1;fontSize=12;fontStyle=0;aspect=fixed;pointerEvents=1;shape=mxgraph.aws4.rds_instance;" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="450" y="640" width="50" height="50" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="db_primary_label" value="Primary DB" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=11;" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="435" y="690" width="80" height="30" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    
    <!-- Replica Database -->
    <mxCell id="db_replica" value="" style="sketch=0;outlineConnect=0;fontColor=#232F3E;gradientColor=none;fillColor=#3F8624;strokeColor=none;dashed=0;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;align=center;html=1;fontSize=12;fontStyle=0;aspect=fixed;pointerEvents=1;shape=mxgraph.aws4.rds_instance;" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="585" y="640" width="50" height="50" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="db_replica_label" value="Replica DB" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=11;" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="570" y="690" width="80" height="30" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    
    <!-- Cache -->
    <mxCell id="cache" value="" style="sketch=0;outlineConnect=0;fontColor=#232F3E;gradientColor=none;fillColor=#C925D1;strokeColor=none;dashed=0;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;align=center;html=1;fontSize=12;fontStyle=0;aspect=fixed;pointerEvents=1;shape=mxgraph.aws4.elasticache;" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="800" y="455" width="60" height="60" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="cache_label" value="Cache (Redis)" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="780" y="520" width="100" height="30" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    
    <!-- CDN -->
    <mxCell id="cdn" value="" style="sketch=0;outlineConnect=0;fontColor=#232F3E;gradientColor=none;fillColor=#8C4FFF;strokeColor=none;dashed=0;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;align=center;html=1;fontSize=12;fontStyle=0;aspect=fixed;pointerEvents=1;shape=mxgraph.aws4.cloudfront;" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="260" y="230" width="60" height="60" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="cdn_label" value="CDN" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="240" y="195" width="100" height="30" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    
    <!-- Connections -->
    <mxCell id="conn1" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#0066CC;" edge="1" parent="1" source="internet" target="lb">
      <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry">
        <mxPoint x="400" y="450" as="sourcePoint"/>
        <mxPoint x="450" y="400" as="targetPoint"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    
    <mxCell id="conn2" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#0066CC;" edge="1" parent="1" source="internet" target="cdn">
      <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry">
        <mxPoint x="400" y="450" as="sourcePoint"/>
        <mxPoint x="450" y="400" as="targetPoint"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    
    <mxCell id="conn3" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#0066CC;" edge="1" parent="1" source="lb" target="web1">
      <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry">
        <mxPoint x="400" y="450" as="sourcePoint"/>
        <mxPoint x="450" y="400" as="targetPoint"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    
    <mxCell id="conn4" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#0066CC;" edge="1" parent="1" source="lb" target="web2">
      <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry">
        <mxPoint x="400" y="450" as="sourcePoint"/>
        <mxPoint x="450" y="400" as="targetPoint"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    
    <mxCell id="conn5" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#009900;" edge="1" parent="1" source="web1" target="app1">
      <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry">
        <mxPoint x="400" y="450" as="sourcePoint"/>
        <mxPoint x="450" y="400" as="targetPoint"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    
    <mxCell id="conn6" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#009900;" edge="1" parent="1" source="web2" target="app2">
      <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry">
        <mxPoint x="400" y="450" as="sourcePoint"/>
        <mxPoint x="450" y="400" as="targetPoint"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    
    <mxCell id="conn7" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#CC0000;" edge="1" parent="1" source="app1" target="db_primary">
      <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry">
        <mxPoint x="400" y="450" as="sourcePoint"/>
        <mxPoint x="450" y="400" as="targetPoint"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    
    <mxCell id="conn8" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#CC0000;" edge="1" parent="1" source="app2" target="db_primary">
      <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry">
        <mxPoint x="400" y="450" as="sourcePoint"/>
        <mxPoint x="450" y="400" as="targetPoint"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    
    <mxCell id="conn9" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#999999;dashed=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="db_primary" target="db_replica">
      <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry">
        <mxPoint x="400" y="450" as="sourcePoint"/>
        <mxPoint x="450" y="400" as="targetPoint"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    
    <mxCell id="conn10" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#9933FF;startArrow=classic;startFill=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="app1" target="cache">
      <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry">
        <mxPoint x="400" y="450" as="sourcePoint"/>
        <mxPoint x="450" y="400" as="targetPoint"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    
    <mxCell id="conn11" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#9933FF;startArrow=classic;startFill=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="app2" target="cache">
      <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry">
        <mxPoint x="400" y="450" as="sourcePoint"/>
        <mxPoint x="450" y="400" as="targetPoint"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    
    <!-- Title -->
    <mxCell id="title" value="Web Application Architecture" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=20;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1">
      <mxGeometry x="400" y="100" width="400" height="40" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    
  </root>
</mxGraphModel>
